definitions.definition: Something that surrounds ; encompassing material, substance or shape.
The atmosphere ; the surrounding air or sky ; atmospheric components collectively such as air, clouds , water vapour , hail , etc.
A type of modern music that creates a relaxing and peaceful atmosphere .

main_definition: Something that surrounds ; encompassing material, substance or shape.
secondary_definitions: ( astrology ) The atmosphere ; the surrounding air or sky ; atmospheric components collectively such as air, clouds , water vapour , hail , etc.
( uncountable , music ) A type of modern music that creates a relaxing and peaceful atmosphere .
